Html: Starting soon, Rawr will be expanded to incorporate many other games, with fewer need of individual devs per model. We hope to have the new MMORPG My Little Bronies fully adapted by the summer release. After that, the Dr Who "Who's Who" mini-game adaptation of Warcraft III Arena maps and many more!
Why are you thinking about expanding? Your Rawr software is in shambles and in desperate need of fixing. Perhaps getting what you have working smoothly should be a higher priority.
Read the date of the post...
